description: The trap is generated when a user fails to authentication.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHUserAuthFailure H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHAttemptUserName s EXAMPLE H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHAttemptIpAddrType i 0 H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHAttemptIpAddr s EXAMPLE H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHUserAuthFailureReason i 1

description: The user name of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHAttemptUserName

description: The IP address type of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHAttemptIpAddrType

description: The IP address of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHAttemptIpAddr

description: The reason for that a user failed to log in.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHUserAuthFailureReason

description: The trap is generated when a user fails to negotiate SSH

event.Summary: User failed to negotiate SSH protocol version

description: The IP address type of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHAttemptIpAddrType

description: The IP address of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHAttemptIpAddr

description: The trap is generated when a user logs in successfully.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHUserLogin H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserName s EXAMPLE H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserIpAddrType i 0 H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserIpAddr s EXAMPLE

description: The user name of SSH session.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserName

description: The user IP address type of SSH session.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserIpAddrType

description: The user IP address of SSH session.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserIpAddr

description: The trap is generated when a user logs off.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHUserLogoff H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserName s EXAMPLE H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserIpAddrType i 0 H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserIpAddr s EXAMPLE

description: The user name of SSH session.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserName

description: The user IP address type of SSH session.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserIpAddrType

description: The user IP address of SSH session.
variables.name: H3C-SSH-MIB::h3cSSHSessionUserIpAddr
